content:
It's hard to say for certain, but it's likely that the sports bar will have a mix of fans, especially if it's a popular spot to watch games. However, since the Bucks are a local team, you might find a higher concentration of Bucks fans in attendance.

As the game approaches, the atmosphere at the sports bar might become more energetic and lively, with fans cheering and reacting to the game. If you're all rooting for Giannis and the Bucks, you might find yourself surrounded by like-minded fans, which can add to the excitement and camaraderie of watching the game together.

That being said, even if there are fans of the opposing team present, a good sports bar usually has a welcoming and respectful atmosphere, where fans of both teams can coexist and enjoy the game together.

When you call the sports bar, you could ask about the typical crowd and atmosphere during Bucks games. They might give you an idea of what to expect and help you plan your visit accordingly.

Remember to also ask about any special activities or events they might have planned for the game, such as giveaways, contests, or prizes. Some sports bars like to create a more engaging experience for fans, so it's worth inquiring about any extras they might have planned!
